Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Devon/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Western, Pratt, Ridge, and Devon due to, street blockage near Devon/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Western, Pratt, Ridge, and Devon due to, street blockage near Devon/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
